Package heap

Class MaxMinHeap

java.lang.Object
heap.MaxMinHeap
public class MaxMinHeap
extends java.lang.Object
MaxMinHeap is a data structure of an almost full binary tree in which, all values in an even levels are larger than values in lower levels and values in odd levels are smaller than all values in lower levels. this class builds such a heap and maintains it.
Version:
(20407-2020b)
Author:
(Ornit Cohen Gindi)

      Parameters:
      ind - index of array representing the vinary tree heap

      public static int indexDepth​(int ind)
      Calculates the level number counting from top to bottom of the binary tree heap. count starts from 0 Complexity O(1)
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      level at which the index is
